comment: Where are you Rich heavy fruit and long finish. I actually preferred the single cask,  hi times more.

Was hesitant due to the Distillate being rice and being a whiskey. 

Absolutely delicious. Wonderful Sherry bomb. Full in flavor and filled with rich fruity notes. Pleasantly surprised. Not much spice or bite. Has a subtle funk in the finish after the sweet fruitiness has subsided, however enough to make it unpleasant, just noticeable. 

Will be looking for a bottle to purchase as I tried this in a bar.

Sweet
Nice nose - you can taste the Sherry 
Sweet - spicy finish, lingers.

Nose: Raisin, dark fruit
Palate, Sherry, Cherry
Finish: Long, chocolate
Sweet taste sherry kind of overpowering.   Long finish but a lot left to be desired.

Nose
Cherry

Nose
Cherry

Alcohol burn on the lips.
Medicinal. Herbal.  Slightly higher proof is noted
Maraschino cherry, vanilla and raisin aroma. Very even cherry, vanilla and cinnamon. Delicious.
Sherry, coffee and fruit. Great nose. Sticks around. Tastes like it smells which is a plus. Amazing deep rich color. Smooth but still with a little bite.
